page.title: 11Truro Livestock Market
page.content: {Livestock Market}at Higher Tregurra, Truro is 2km from the city centre. {Market Day is Wednesday.}Farmers selling animals, come from a radius of 40km. Animals are transported to the market by lorries and trailers. Operating at this market are three firms of auctioneers;{Lodge & Thomas, {Reg.Cann}and{Richards, Son & Murdoch. They are Leaseholders. The building is divided into sections for{Sheep; Pigs; {Calves; Dairy, Store and Fat Cattle. RSPCA Officers patrol the market to ensure animals are not badly treated. On Market Days, clerical staff and porters total 35, working with 8 auctioneers. Selling starts at 10 a.m. Auctioneers have a rota to vary the sections in which they work each week. Auctioning continues until the afternoon. Some buyers come regularly from as far away as 200 miles.
